thread.title: BRIEF-Beijing Urban Construction Investment & Development Signs Agreement On Housing Renovation Contract

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Beijing Urban Construction Investment & Development Signs Agreement On Housing Renovation Contract

organizations.name: beijing urban construction investment & development co ltd

text:
Jan 15 (Reuters) - Beijing Urban Construction Investment & Development Co Ltd:
* SAYS IT SIGNS AGREEMENT ON HOUSING RENOVATION CONTRACT WITH TOTAL INVESTMENT AT 14 BILLION YUAN ($2.18 billion) Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2mG8nD0 Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.4278 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
